候.definition: to wait; to inquire after; to watch; season; climate; (old) period of five days

候乘.definition: to wait for a train or bus

候任.definition: -elect; designate; (i.e. elected or appointed but not yet installed)

候命.definition: to await orders; to be on call

候場.definition: (of an actor, athlete etc) to prepare to make one's entrance; to wait in the wings

候補.definition: to wait to fill a vacancy; reserve (candidate); alternate; substitute

候診.definition: waiting to see a doctor; awaiting treatment

候車.definition: to wait for a train or bus

候風地動儀.definition: the world's first seismograph invented by Zhang Heng 張衡|张衡[Zhang1 Heng2] in 132
